message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value your interest, $10,000 is significantly below its true worth. I could consider letting it go for $17,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking to stay within my budget of $8,000. Would it be possible for you to lower the price further?
